column2:
"Hello~!
I have received information of the
next rumour!"

"The rumour this time is that Mr. Umbra
will appear in the direction pointed by
Galf!"

"As it is easy to find Galf, if the rumour is
true, it will save us a lot of time and
effort to find Mr. Umbra!"

"Let's strike when the iron is hot!
I'll be glad if you can help me
investigate again this time!"

"やっほー！
次のウワサを入手したよっ！"

"今度はなんと、ガルフが向かうところに
Mr.アンブラが現れるとか！"

"ガルフって割りと見つけやすいし
ウワサが本当なら、Mr.アンブラを探す
手間が省けちゃう！"

"善は急げっていうよね！
今回も調査をしてくれると嬉しいな！"
